: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus transformes to bot mode, and starts a diagnostic scan on Nightlight and the baby.
Then Flicker and Condor come in. Rodimus turns to face them, and sees Flicker's expression.
Rodimus Prime: Believe me, I know how you feel. This little girl is my...
Roddy stops looking at Nightlight and the child with much love in his face.
Rodimus Prime: Our child.
Rodimus then notices that Condor isn't speaking.
Rodimus Prime: What happened to Condor?
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote:Flicker::

The spy works quickly, short-circuiting one of Condor's memory 
engrams so the Maximal won't remember what happened in the past 
hour.  Then he picks up the other bot and carries him inside to the 
med-bay.

Flicker is a bit surprised when he sees Rodimus already 
there.  "Rodimus!  I didn't know you were back already!"

He hefts Condor onto an examining table, checking one last time to 
make sure his 'touch-up job' can't be noticed without close 
examination.  Turning around to face Roddy and Nightlight, he 
says:  "Condor and I were on our way to tell you something when - oh 
my ..."  He gasps as he sees the infant.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> nighlight::
> 
> Nightlight move towards the medical table, and lay there, she was 
> very tired but calmed down. The little one just moved a bit, yawed 
> and continued sleeping in her mommy's arms
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > Rodimus smiled at being called a father. 
> > Rodimus Prime: Thanks Yggdrasil. Of course if anything really 
> serious comes up contact me. Rodimus out. 
> > Roddy closes the link, and waits for Nightlight and the baby to 
> make it to the table. 
> >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: 
> Yggdrasil smiled wearily.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: So the legendary Rodimus Prime is a father...
> > Congratulations, both of you! I'll monitor the battle east, but 
I'm
> > not sure what I can do about it. Until then, good rest.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > 
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> > > Rodimus Prime(via commlink): Yes we are fine. Nightlight went 
> into
> > labor while we were on mission. Our daughter has been born... 
> > > That simple fact still shocked Rodimus in a good way. 
> > >  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil: Are you and Nighlight all right, Rodimus? Blackfang 
> told me
> > > something happened to her?
